name: @automationcloud/robot
description: APIs for running Automation Cloud scripts
author: UBIO

scripts.init: npm i && lerna clean -y && lerna bootstrap && npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.clean: lerna exec -- rm -rf *.tsbuildinfo out/ && lerna run clean
scripts.release: npm run preversion && lerna version --no-push --force-publish -y && lerna publish from-git -y
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run docs && git add docs/
